General.Name: Zhejiang Xinneng Photovoltaic Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Sunoren Solar Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the investment, construction, and operation of photovoltaic power stations to distribute solar power generation in China. It operates in distributed power station and energy storage, smart EV charging stations, module manufacturing, energy cloud platform, intelligent operation and maintenance, and other energy storage products. Zhejiang Sunoren Solar Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Haining, China.
